meta.name: The Bold and the Beautiful
meta.description: They created a dynasty where passion rules, they are the Forresters, the first name in Fashion. The Bold and the Beautiful, a world of fashion, glamor and romance. A place where power, money and success are there for the taking in a city where dreams really do come true. Follow the lives and loves of the Forresters on The Bold and the Beautiful...

videos.title: Ep. #9671

videos.title: Mon Mar 23 1987
videos.overview: Thorne and Ridge don't see eye to eye with the new Fall Line as the Forrester fashion show is taking place on stage. Meanwhile, Ridge gets a warning from Bill Spencer to stay away from his daughter Caroline, only to flaunt it and ultimately proposes to her. Brooke gets attacked while on her way home.

videos.title: Tues Mar 24 1987
videos.overview: Stephanie wonders if Eric is interested in Margo. Storm is furious about Brooke's attack and urges her to tell Katie and Donna. Ridge and Caroline tell Eric and Stephanie about their engagement. Bill tells Margo he made Ridge dump Caroline.

videos.title: Wed Mar 25 1987
videos.overview: Thorne and Stephanie wonder if Caroline is pregnant. Beth reassures Katie about her complexion. Brooke tells Katie and Donna about her attack. Caroline tells Bill she is marrying Ridge. Bill tries to hide his rage.

videos.title: Thurs Mar 26 1987
videos.overview: Bill tells Margo he won't let Caroline marry Ridge. Dave tells Brooke he wants to use her as bait to catch the rapists. Brooke is worried. Thorne suspects Ridge is marrying Caroline to spite Bill. Bill tries to convince Caroline that Ridge is no good for her but she refuses to stop her wedding plans.

videos.title: Fri Mar 27 1987
videos.overview: Brooke tells Dave she will act as a decoy. Dave is reluctant but agrees. Stephanie and Eric meet Bill and offer to use their home for the wedding. Donna tells Storm Dave has a plan involving Brooke and Storm rushes to find Dave. Bill has Ridge followed.

videos.title: March 30 1987-Monday
videos.overview: Bill pressures Margo to tell him about Ridge but she refuses. Dave proposes to Brooke but she says she'll have to think it over. Storm and Dave argue about using Brooke as a decoy. Eric confronts Ridge about whether or not he loves Caroline.

videos.title: Tuesday March 31 1987
videos.overview: Kristen tells Stephanie she can't attend the wedding. Donna meets Rocco and convinces him to ask Katie out. He agrees and Katie is overjoyed. Thorne and Caroline meet and Thorne feels an attraction to her. Stephanie gets a suspicious phone call.

videos.title: Wednesday April 1 1987
videos.overview: Stephanie suspects there is something going on between Margo and Eric. Rocco arrives for his date with Katie and is disappointed in her looks. Eric and Stephanie argue about her relationship with Kristen. Caroline calls Kristen and convinces her to come to the wedding.

videos.title: Thursday April 2 1987
videos.overview: Margo tells Ridge he is wrong for Caroline and she doesn't want him to hurt her. Caroline convinces Bill to give Ridge a chance. Brooke isn't ready to marry Dave. Bill tells Conway to call off the investigation of Ridge. Ridge agrees to meet Alex for a drink.

videos.title: Friday April 3 1987
videos.overview: Eric urges Stephanie to make up with Kristen. Thorne is worried when Ridge leaves to meet Alex. Alex gets Ridge to reminisce about all the good times they had together. Conway gets the message that Bill called off the investigation but proceeds to take a picture of Alex and Ridge making love.

videos.title: Mon Apr 06 1987
videos.overview: Bill tells Margo to confess all about her relationship with Ridge or drop the subject. Beth wonders if Eric remembers her. Ridge is worried about Conway's picture. Thorne confronts Ridge about his disappearance but Ridge doesn't tell him about Alex.

videos.title: Tues Apr 07 1987
videos.overview: Brooke tells Storm how much she envies Caroline's wedding. Alex approaches Ridge again but he tells her he only loves Caroline and is worried he will lose her because of the picture. Bill tells Ridge he accepts him and trusts him. Conway gives Bill the picture. Kristen and Caroline become friends.

videos.title: Wed Apr 08 1987
videos.overview: Bill is furious when he sees the picture of Ridge and Alex. Bill shows the picture to Margo and tells her he doesn't know what to do. Kristen and Stephanie agree to try to be friends. Ridge tells Caroline he loves her. Ridge and Caroline have a press conference about the wedding.

videos.title: Thurs Apr 09 1987
videos.overview: Beth tells Brooke she knew Eric in college. Dave and Brooke have a romantic dinner. Brooke is angry when Dave admits Storm talked him out of the decoy plan. Bill tells Ridge he wants to speak to him after the party.

videos.title: Fri Apr 10 1987
videos.overview: Donna realizes Katie is upset that Rocco hasn't called her and convinces him to ask her out again. Bill confronts Ridge with the picture. Ridge tells Bill it was a mistake but Bill wants the wedding called off immediately.

videos.title: Monday April 13 1987
videos.overview: Ridge tells Thorne about the picture. Donna tells Beth the truth about Rocco's interest in Katie. Bill urges Caroline to call Ridge. Ridge decides not to tell Caroline anything. Rocco tells Donna he wants to date her, not Katie.

videos.title: Tuesday April 14 1987
videos.overview: Stephanie and Kristen argue about Kristen's love life. Storm tries to convince Grandma Logan to move in with the rest of the family. Ridge tells Bill he will have to tell Caroline if he wants her to know the truth because Ridge refuses to hurt her.

videos.title: Wednesday April 15 1987
videos.overview: Ridge tells Thorne he talked to Bill and hopes Bill won't tell Caroline about Alex. Caroline is thrilled about the wedding. Bill arrives for the wedding and tells Caroline there is something he must tell her.

videos.title: Thursday April 16 1987
videos.overview: Stephanie is upset that Margo is at the wedding but Eric defends Margo. Bill tells Caroline about Ridge and Alex and she is heartbroken. Caroline decides to go through with the wedding anyway but collapses at the altar. Brooke tells Storm she's going to act as a decoy whether he likes it or not.

videos.title: Friday April 17 1987
videos.overview: Caroline is taken to the hospital. The doctor announces she is in shock and needs to be kept overnight. Ridge is devastated to think Bill told Caroline the truth just as she was about to walk down the aisle. Katie is smitten with Rocco.

videos.title: Episode 994
videos.overview: Ruthanne is almost mugged by a homeless person but Stephanie saves her by handing over their money. Ruthanne is touched by Stephanie's concern. Darla finds out from Eric that no one knows where Stephanie is. Stephanie asks about Ruthanne's past.

videos.title: Episode 995
videos.overview: Margo confronts Bill about Donna. Bill tells Margo that he won't hire Donna. Sally pumps Felicia for information about Stephanie but Felicia resents her questioning. Macy confronts Sally about it and Sally explains she must tell the Forresters what she saw.

videos.title: Episode 996
videos.overview: Thorne and Macy discuss what Sally said about Stephanie being a homeless person. Thorne accuses Sally of lying. Macy is insulted and she gets into a big fight with Thorne. Sally swears she will find Stephanie. Jake and Felicia look forward to the future.

videos.title: Episode 997
videos.overview: Sally runs offs thousands of copies of Stephanie's picture to circulate on Skid Row. Macy is furious. Sally agrees not to do it for Macy's sake. Thorne decides he must leave Forrester because of Sally's conflict with the Forresters.

videos.title: Episode 998
videos.overview: Ruthanne decides to set Stephanie up with another homeless person named Adam. Macy tells Thorne not to leave Forrester. Sally tells Darla to throw out the pictures of Stephanie. Stephanie is feeling lonely on the streets.

videos.title: Episode 999
videos.overview: Clarke asks to see Felicia's designs but she refuses. Thorne tells Brooke he asked Macy to leave Spectra. Brooke thinks that's a mistake. Macy tells Sally she may leave Spectra. Blake calls Taylor and asks if he can show her how much he's changed.

videos.title: Episode 1000
videos.overview: Blake visits Taylor, invites her to dinner, and she reluctantly accepts. Ruthanne sets up Adam and Stephanie to meet alone; an encounter that leads to a kiss. Thorne changes his mind about leaving Forrester. He wants Macy to quit Spectra and join him there. Eric expresses doubt about this plan, upsetting Thorne. Macy tells her mother, Sally, that she is leaving Spectra. Sally feels it is her fault and pleads for her to stay.

videos.title: Episode 1001
videos.overview: Felicia shows Jake her sketches, which she has purposely botched in hopes of being fired. Sally and Clarke view the awful sketches, but Sally raves about them. She later explains to Clarke that Felicia is trying to sabotage her fashion line. Sally will attempt to make her plan backfire. Macy sadly tells Thorne she resigned from Spectra. Thorne appreciates her sacrifice and talks of starting a family. Stephanie and Adam kiss again. Stephanie may be in love. In an effort to find Stephanie, Sally decides to circulate leaflets.

videos.title: Episode 1002
videos.overview: Felicia tells Jake that she thinks Sally is calling her bluff by claiming to like the sketches. Jake warns Felicia to be careful. Julie stops by and chats with Bill. Bill later confronts Margo and asks if she still loves him. She thinks they both need to change their attitudes to make it work. Taylor meets her ex-husband, Blake, at a cafe. They reminisce and Blake admits that he still has hope for the two of them. Macy is overwhelmed by the thought of having a baby and quitting her job.

videos.title: Episode 1003
videos.overview: Ridge returns from his trip and catches up with Brooke. She is glad he is back. Blake tries to woo his ex-wife, Taylor. Jake thanks Margo for her support during the time following the death of their uncle. Jake also tries to make amends with Bill, who acts insensitive to the situation.

videos.title: Episode 1004
videos.overview: Eric visits the recently returned Ridge. Ridge is upset when he finds out that Stephanie still has not been heard from. Stephanie goes on a date with Adam and they enjoy good conversation at a skid row diner. Later, Saul and Darla enter the same diner distributing the flyers Sally had made.

videos.title: Episode 1005
videos.overview: Brooke tells Ridge that she thinks Stephanie is staying away on purpose, to punish her family. Lt. Burke arrives and tells the two that Stephanie's car was found in a Mexican chop shop. Sally and Saul receive so many crank calls regarding the flyers that they hang up on a burn from the diner who actually saw Stephanie. Ruthanne and Stephanie are forced out of their roan for the night by a menacing Hector.

videos.title: Episode 1006
videos.overview: Eric begins to worry about Stephanie, even though Brooke tells him that she thinks it is a ploy. Thorne and Ridge are surprised when shown a flyer with Stephanie's picture on it. Thorne realizes that Sally put them out, and storms out to tell Macy Stephanie and Ruthanne sleep in a cardboard box, but Ruthanne is awakened by Adam, who explains to her Stephanie's real identity.

videos.title: Episode 1007
videos.overview: Ridge and Eric are concerned about Stephanie's whereabouts. Macy confronts Sally about the flyers and Sally admits that they were a mistake. Lt. Burke questions Sally. Adam convinces Ruthanne to help him get Stephanie home. Stephanie returns home after tearful goodbyes to Adam and Ruthanne, but has no recognition of her bane.

videos.title: Episode 1008
videos.overview: Stephanie is back home, but has no memory of it. The doctor explains that she had a small stroke and needs to be hospitalized for a few days. Ridge, Felicia, and Eric try to remind her of her past.

videos.title: Episode 1009
videos.overview: Stephanie is examined at the hospital, where Ridge, Eric, Felicia, Thorne, and Brooke gather as the news spreads. Dr. Marshall reports that she has suffered a small stroke and that only her memory is affected. He says that Stephanie told him she ran out of gas in a bad neighborhood, was mugged, and had her car stolen. Her memory should have returned by now, but she does not appear to recognize anyone.

videos.title: Episode 1010
videos.overview: In the Forrester steam roam, Ridge and Eric talk about Stephanie's situation. When Eric leaves for a phone call, Brooke enters, thinks it is Eric in the thick fog, and proceeds to drop her towel and be intimate with him. Ridge does not stop her and when she finally realizes that it is him, Brooke promises she will get even with him someday. Blake and Margo happen to run into each other at the Taxi Bar. They talk and are attracted to one another. Blake wants to extend their evening, but Margo declines. Thorne tells Macy about his mother's condition and where she has been.

videos.title: Episode 1011
videos.overview: Ridge stops by Taylor's office, and he tells her his mother needs her help. She agrees to see Stephanie later. Blake shows up in Taylor's office as well. He charms her and invites her to dinner again. She turns him down. Blake finds out from Claire that the man in Taylor's life is Ridge. Blake stares at Ridge from a distance. Sally and Clarke decide to show Felicia's horrible designs in a fashion show all by themselves. Felicia decides to call Sally's bluff and agrees to the solo showing.

videos.title: Episode 1012
videos.overview: Macy updates Sally on Stephanie's situation. Ridge visits Stephanie in the hospital, and has Taylor talk to her. Taylor concludes that Stephanie is psychologically healthy. Stephanie asks Taylor if she is interested in Ridge, but Taylor refuses to answer. Taylor returns to her office and is surprised by Blake. Blake invites her to dinner, and she accepts. Ridge finds out from Brooke that Taylor is no longer engaged and calls Taylor to invite her for dinner. She declines, explaining that she has other plans, and then leaves for Pierre's Cafe with Blake. Ridge then goes to dinner with Brooke. Felicia tells Jake about her plan to call Sally's bluff, and the two end up kissing.

videos.title: Episode 1013
videos.overview: As Ridge and Brooke are having dinner. Blake and Taylor show up at the same restaurant, catch a glimpse of Ridge and Brooke, and abruptly leave. Blake and Taylor go to another place, but she has lost her appetite. Ridge and Brooke have a nice dinner, and even dance. Ridge asks Brooke not to tell Eric about their date. Eric visits Stephanie at the hospital and tells her what she used to be like, and asks her not to return to the streets.

videos.title: Episode 1014
videos.overview: Ridge and Brooke visit Stephanie, who tells them that Eric had just been there. Eric is at bane with Thorne, and they debate over whether or not to tell Brooke he had visited Stephanie. Eric later lies to Brooke about his visit, and she cannot believe that he would hide something from her. Blake and Taylor return from their date and kiss. Blake tells her he thinks they should try to make it work again. While Blake and Taylor listen to him on her answering machine, Ridge tells her that he would like to get together with her sometime soon.

videos.title: Episode 1015
videos.overview: A frazzled Brooke tells Ridge that Eric lied to her. She still thinks Stephanie is pretending to have amnesia, but Ridge disagrees. Blake spent the night on Taylor's couch--alone. Ridge arrives after Blake leaves and the two speak briefly, kiss passionately, and Ridge carries her over near the fireplace to make love. Sally explains to Julie how she found Stephanie. Sally tells a worried Felicia that the show is definitely on for tomorrow.

videos.title: Episode 1016
videos.overview: Ridge and Taylor bask in the afterglow of lovemaking. Blake later meets Taylor and can tell she has just had sex. He thinks she should continue to see both he and Ridge. Sally and Clarke are worried about the fashion show, but when Eric calls and scolds her for telling the newspaper about finding Stephanie, she angrily decides to go through with it to destroy Felicia. Felicia tells Eric not to attend her fashion show, that she won't be working for Spectra after tomorrow. When Felicia hears from Darla that the show will go on as planned, she panics and vows not to let Sally ruin her.

videos.title: Episode 1017
videos.overview: Felicia works all night long, trying to prepare a new concept to save the show. Jake gives her an idea. Sally and Clarke don't think that Felicia can salvage her collection in one night, but after the unique, dazzling dance fashion show, Sally introduces her new star, Felicia to the cheers of the audience.

videos.title: Episode 1018
videos.overview: After the successful show, Sally claims all of the credit to the press. Eric tells Sally that he would like to make an offer for Felicia's contract. Julie is covering the event, but is attracted to Clarke. The two end up alone in a room and Darla is shocked when she walks in on them kissing. Stephanie is visited by Ruthanne and Adam at the hospital.

videos.title: Episode 1019
videos.overview: Eric stops by to see Stephanie, but Adam and Ruthanne are there. Eric comes back later and sees Adam and Stephanie kissing. Bill reads about Stephanie in the paper and is shocked. Margo asks him if he wants a divorce. Margo happens to meet Blake at the Taxi Bar, where they talk of being together. Ridge commends Brooke on her work in the Forrester lab and assures her that Stephanie has no power over her.

videos.title: Episode 1020
videos.overview: Sally visits Stephanie in the hospital, where the two get along well and end up embracing. Ridge shows Thorne the article about Stephanie, and Thorne shows Macy. Thorne is furious, but Macy thinks the Forresters should thank Sally instead of treating her like an enemy. Clark tells Julie that he wants to see her but doesn't want to give up his marriage to Sally. Julie agrees because she loves him.

videos.title: Ep. #3795
videos.overview: When Stephanie discovers Brooke and Deacon's shocking secret about Brooke's pregnancy and Whip's blackmailing, she tells a humiliated Brooke how things are going to be so Bridget won't get humiliated.

videos.title: Ep. #3819
videos.overview: As Bridget and the other women in the Forrester family throw Brooke a baby shower, Whip taunts Deacon. Later, Bridget learns of a bombshell revelation regarding Brooke and Deacon.

videos.title: Ep. #3829
videos.overview: As Bridget confronts Brooke about her affair with Deacon, Deacon and Whip discuss how the fallout will take a toll on both women.

videos.title: January 6 2003
videos.overview: Ridge and Eric face off in Portofino, Italy to see who the better designer will be and which Design House will be victorious - Forrester Creations or Spectra Designs. Thorne and Macy have a heart to heart.

videos.title: Ep. #4845
videos.overview: As Nick and Brooke argue about the latest advertising campaign before their wedding, Stephanie urges Ridge to go down to the marina to be a shoulder to lean on in case the wedding is called off.

videos.title: Ep. #5005
videos.overview: As Pam listens in, Stephanie and Eric argue about letting Ann continue living in the guest house. Rick is less than thrilled with Brooke and Ridge agreeing that it's for the best he no longer date Phoebe.

videos.title: Ep. #5239
videos.overview: Ashley pays Taylor a visit and learns that Taylor has planned a dinner party for Brooke and Ridge. Ashley is taken aback. Rick is also surprised when Ashley tells him about it. What Brooke, Ridge and even Nick don't know is that Taylor has a hidden agenda for the party. Their first clue to what Taylor has in store comes in the form of Taylor's third guest: a minister.

videos.title: Ep. #5240
videos.overview: Taylor springs a shocker on Brooke and Ridge when they come over for her dinner party. Nick is taken aback as well. Taylor invited a minister in order to marry the two of them right then and there. Brooke is furious, but Ridge thinks the idea is a good one. Brooke tells Ridge in private that Taylor is only doing this because she believes Brooke is a threat to her own marriage. Elsewhere, Ashley surprises Rick by telling him that she would like to get back together with him. Rick tells her he is a bit gun shy after she dumped him for Ridge. Ashley reminds him that he once dumped her for Phoebe. Rick tells her he would like time to think about it.

videos.title: Ep. #5241
videos.overview: Brooke resists Taylor's ploy and refuses to get married to Ridge on the spot. Everyone begins to suspect Taylor is unhinged. Meanwhile, Jackie pays Stephanie an unwanted visit and shocks her with the news: Brooke is the egg-donor for baby Jack. Both Brooke and Taylor are the baby's biological mothers. Stephanie refuses to believe it until Bridget stops by and confirms the story. Bridget's mother is also the mother of baby Jack; and Bridget was the one who caused the mix-up in the lab.

videos.title: Ep. #5242
videos.overview: Brooke visits Donna and learns to her dismay that Eric is with her. It seems Donna and Eric are still seeing each other, which spells trouble for Storm. Donna promised Stephanie she would stay away from Eric; in exchange, Stephanie would not turn Storm over to the police. Donna and Eric promise Brooke that they will be careful and that Stephanie will never find out what they are up to. Later, Brooke must tangle with Stephanie over another matter. Stephanie, despite her promise to support Brooke after the rape incident, is now trying to discourage her relationship with Ridge. And it's all because of what she now knows about Nick, Taylor and baby Jack. Meanwhile, Nick asks Dr. Warwick what he can do to help his wife, Taylor, who seems to be losing her mind. Warwick gives him a surprising answer.

videos.title: Ep. #5243
videos.overview: Dr. Warwick tells Nick he can't make a breakthrough with Taylor until he knows the truth. Is Nick still in love with Brooke? Nick goes to the marina to clear his head and do a little soul-searching in order to learn the truth. Later, Warwick tells Taylor what he asked Nick. Taylor begins to hallucinate. She sees Taylor walking into her house and declare that Nick is now hers. Meanwhile, Stephanie confronts Brooke, demanding to know if she is still in love with Nick. Brooke resists being baited. Later, she finds Nick at the marina.

videos.title: Ep. #5244
videos.overview: Nick tells Brooke that he still loves her, but she is relieved when he adds that he is still committed to his marriage with Taylor. But then he appalls her by stating his intention to tell Taylor how he feels about Brooke. Meanwhile, Brooke is the subject of Taylor's hallucination. The Brooke in her mind taunts her over the fact that she stole Ridge from her and declares that she'll steal Nick and her baby as well. Dr. Warwick does his best to help Taylor through her mental crisis. Elsewhere, Rick confides in his sister, Bridget, about his concerns for Taylor's well-being. Bridget, for her part, is worried that her friendship with Taylor is forever ruined, thanks to her mistake in the lab that caused Brooke's egg to be implanted in Taylor's womb, resulting in baby Jack, the son of both Brooke and Taylor

videos.title: Ep. #5245
videos.overview: Taylor confronts Nick and demands to know if he still has feelings for Brooke. Nick reluctantly admits that he still loves her; but he tells her he doesn't want to end the marriage. He says he loves Brooke, but she is not on his mind. That's not good enough. Taylor says she is leaving him, and she does. Nick immediately calls Brooke and tells her the news. Brooke comes straight over. Meanwhile, Rick, who heard the news when his mother did, goes straight to Taylor to comfort her, and perhaps do more than comfort her. Taylor is terribly upset and pours out her heart to Rick.

videos.title: Ep. #5266
videos.overview: Bill, Katie, Ridge, and Brooke are stunned to discover that Liam and Steffy, and Hope and Thomas are at the same resort. Meanwhile, when Liam makes that realization, he tries to get Hope's attention, only to have Steffy and Thomas doing their best to keep them apart.

videos.title: Ep. #6635
videos.overview: Maya is disappointed when Rick is late to the premiere of the movie she starred in with Carter. While on his jet to Monaco, Bill is thinking back to his confrontation with Katie. Upon arriving at the hotel in Monaco, Brooke is surprised to find Donna there and they discuss what happened between her and Bill in the past. Later, Brooke finds Bill has arrived and is proclaiming his love to her.

videos.title: Ep. #6722
videos.overview: With Ridge back in town, he asks Eric to fill him in on everything going on with Brooke and the family while he was gone. As Brooke and Hope get ready for Hope and Liam's wedding, Quinn urges Steffy to go back to LA that she's been having treatments to conceive a child so Hope can start a relationship with Wyatt.

videos.title: Ep. #6837
videos.overview: As Ridge rushes to Dubai to stop Brooke and Bill's wedding, their respective families discuss how Quinn and Bill's one night stand is going to have repercussions in everyone's lives, both personal and professional.

videos.title: Ep. #6886
videos.overview: As Liam arrives in Paris with Ivy to go proclaim his love to Hope, Wyatt tries to convince Hope that he won't show up at the time Hope told him to. Back in Forrester Creations in LA, Brooke is thrilled at hearing about their upcoming meeting. Meanwhile, Quinn tries her best to waylay Liam before he is reunited with Hope.

videos.title: Ep. #6889
videos.overview: After getting a call from Bill, Brooke tells Deacon that Hope and Wyatt are getting married in Monaco. Liam soon discovers where Wyatt and Hope are and what they're planning to do.

videos.title: Ep. #6900
videos.overview: While Hope is busy moving in, Wyatt tries to get Liam to take in her cat. He then interrupts a meeting Liam is having with Bob Barker in regards to responsible pet ownership and a scuffle soon occurs. As Deacon drops in on Hope, looking for advice on how to win Brooke back from Bill, Bill pays her a visit to discuss the status of their relationship.

videos.title: Ep. #7218
videos.overview: Liam is confused as to why Steffy is suddenly so concerned with Ivy and Wyatt's relationship.

videos.title: Ep. #7322
videos.overview: Nicole confronts Sasha about her use of the word sister. Sasha tries to back paddle, but Nicole starts to piece everything together. Sasha eventually confirms that they are sisters. As Nicole digests the news, Sasha begs her not to tell Julius that she knows the truth. Surprisingly though, Nicole is extremely supportive of Sasha. Maya invites her parents to join her for lunch while Zende meets with Rick. Zende admits to Rick that Sasha is fun, but Nicole would be the only woman in his life if she hadn't chosen to be Maya's surrogate. Later, Zende finds a shaken Sasha at the photo studio while Nicole confronts Julius.

videos.title: Ep. #7323
videos.overview: Sasha confides in Zende about her childhood and confesses her fears about what the immediate future holds. A blindsided Julius gets on the defensive when faced with accusations hurled at him by Nicole. Eventually, Julius confesses that he had an affair with Lucy Thompson, their neighbor, out of which Sasha was born. He tries to explain that this took place when Maya left the family to have her sex change and he and Vivienne couldn't see eye to eye over Myron's decision to physically become a woman. Meanwhile, Vivienne tells Maya and Rick that she feels bad for Sasha who had a tough childhood growing up without a father. When Vivienne returns to the motel, Nicole is there alone. Julius finds Sasha and accuses her of selfishness for telling Nicole. He says that he will never be able to forgive her and most definitely never consider her part of his family despite the blood relation!

videos.title: Ep. #7324
videos.overview: Katie spots a newspaper article on Dr. Wolin's death and is stunned to see Ridge in the background of a picture of the accident site. She pays Ridge an unwelcome visit and demands to know if he was involved in the doctor's death. Ridge manages to convince Katie that he wasn't, yet she is more convinced than ever that the doctor was right about one thing: Ridge is not the father of Caroline's baby! Across the hall, Thomas fusses over Douglas while Caroline critiques his design. Julius attempts to compromise with Sasha, who is adamant that she won't be pushed out of town - or his life - any longer. A glum Nicole takes her mother to the Forrester Mansion where Julius announces that Sasha is leaving Los Angeles. While Sasha keeps mum, Nicole increases the pressure on her father to finally come clean...

videos.title: Ep. #7325
videos.overview: Nicole forces Julius to reveal the truth. Julius confesses to his wife about his affair with Lucy Thompson and that Sasha is his daughter. Vivienne is stunned that her husband lied to her for all these years. With tears in his eyes, Julius asks his wife for forgiveness, but Vivienne tells him to leave. As the news begins to sink in, both Nicole and Sasha comfort her and the women embrace. Caroline is riddled with guilt once more when Thomas states that he hopes for being as good a father one day as his dad is to Douglas. Bombarded with questions by Katie, Ridge tells her that Douglas is actually not his biological son as they used an anonymous sperm donor. Katie appreciates Ridge's honesty and promises to keep silent. When she later visits Caroline, Katie can't help herself but to let it slip that she knows about Douglas' paternity. A shocked Caroline then stuns Katie as she accidentally mentions that Thomas is the father!

videos.title: Ep. #7326
videos.overview: Deacon learns the hard way that Quinn is still hung up on Liam. Quinn is head over heels in love and considers Liam's reaction to not call the police a sign that there is still hope for a relationship. Bill encourages Liam to return to Spencer Publications and is stunned to learn that his son got paid a visit from Quinn. Thomas offers to support Ridge so that he can take a paternity leave and Rick - not without an ulterior motive - also encourages the idea. Caroline regrets her conversation with Katie when she is pressured to confirm that Thomas is Douglas' father. While Thomas finds a shaken Caroline, Katie confronts Ridge about his deception. After he has told her the entire story how Caroline got pregnant, Katie then reminds Ridge that secrets get more dangerous the longer they are kept as such. Not long after, Thomas is in for the shock of his life as his father makes a startling revelation to him...

videos.title: Ep. #7327
videos.overview: Thomas processes the news that Douglas is his son. Ridge corrects him, stating that Douglas is his son as Thomas sleeping with Caroline was an event they all wish to forget it ever happened. He pressures Thomas to accept that he and Caroline will raise the child as a family... Katie tries to reassure Caroline who rails at her for interfering. Bill gives Steffy advice regarding her marriage. Wyatt extends an olive branch to Liam in hopes of his brother stepping away from Steffy, but Liam can't just forget about his feelings that easily.

videos.title: Ep. #7328
videos.overview: Liam is convinced that Steffy misses their relationship. He implores Steffy to end her marriage, but she feels too much has happened and Wyatt urges his brother to move on. Yet, Liam refuses to give up. Caroline explains to Katie the details of Douglas' conception. Meanwhile, Thomas is speechless that Ridge wants to deny him his own son as he just begins to realize the reason for his strong bond to Douglas. Ridge claims Douglas will have a family he can be proud of and will never know how he was conceived or what Thomas did to his mother. Thomas finally understands why his father's attitude towards him changed last year. Thomas notes that Caroline wasn't Ridge's wife back then as they had just broken up. The realization that Caroline kept the truth from him about his son as well hits Thomas hard. Pam is taking care of baby Douglas when Thomas walks in shortly after. He grabs Douglas, walks to the parking lot and puts him in his car and drives off!

videos.title: Ep. #7336
videos.overview: Katie freaks out after Brooke slips out from under her bed. Bill and Brooke try to explain, but Katie doesn't want any excuses when it's obvious to her that Brooke was trying to seduce her husband. She pours Bill and Brooke drinks and then runs off with the liquor to lock herself in the bedroom. Outside, Bill and Brooke worry about Katie who tells them to go away, but at the same places the liquor bottle on the floor without opening it. When Julius gloats about how close Nicole and Zende are getting again, Sasha advises him to not get his hopes up for a reunion. Julius voices his doubts about this sudden and extremely convenient pregnancy, but Sasha tells him to shove it. Zende apologizes to Nicole for the reason why he had broken up with her. Excited to reunite with Zende, Nicole senses that there is a bit of hesitation on his part as he breaks it that Sasha is pregnant

videos.title: Ep. #7337
videos.overview: Nicole can't believe that, just after she agreed to get back together with Zende, he tells her that Sasha is pregnant with his baby. Sasha offers to help Julius reunite with his family if he backs her up regarding her being pregnant with Zende's baby. Dr. Farrell informs Nicole that she is healthy enough to be released tonight. Sasha stops by under the pretense of checking on her sister, but Nicole sees right through it and wonders whether Sasha is really pregnant by Zende. When asked to support his son's attempt to win back Steffy, Bill remains neutral and encourages Liam to seek therapy to come to terms with his feelings. At the police station, Lt. Baker tells Quinn that Liam's decision is crucial as to whether she will be charged. Wyatt pays his mother a visit and realizes that Quinn only acted out of love for him - and Liam! Wyatt is in disbelief because Quinn is still hoping that Liam will be her savior.

videos.title: Ep. #7338
videos.overview: With Liam having to decide Quinn's fate, Wyatt makes a plea to his brother to have mercy on his mother. Having been hired by Liam as a legal consultant, Justin preps Bill for what could be in store for Quinn if she is convicted. When Quinn learns that Liam put Justin on retainer, she believes that her fate has been sealed. Quinn's lawyer, Ed, explains to Liam the ramifications of pressing charges against her. Even Justin admits that legally their case is very weak as Quinn never locked Liam up at the cabin. Quinn makes a plea for Liam's feelings for her, but Liam hushes her and states that what happened between them was based on a lie. Lt. Baker then urges Liam to finally make his decision: Does he want to press charges against Quinn - or not?

videos.title: Ep. #7339
videos.overview: Katie assures a concerned Brooke that she and Bill no longer have anything to worry about regarding her drinking. While awaiting word from Liam, Bill and Wyatt differ in their opinions regarding what Quinn deserves for keeping Liam at the cabin. Liam takes the opportunity to unload the suppressed anger and resentment he has for Quinn for losing Steffy: he tells Lt. Baker that he is pressing charges against Quinn! After Justin explains that a trial with an unlikely outcome could make not only Liam, but also Bill, Steffy and Wyatt part of a public spectacle, Liam reconsiders. Wyatt is relieved by this news and Quinn is thrilled as she takes it as a sign that deep down Liam still has feelings for. She promises a puzzled Liam to redeem herself.

videos.title: Ep. #7340
videos.overview: Eric, Brooke, Nicole, Vivienne, and Zende fawn over Rick, Maya, and their new baby. The proud parents reveal the child's name: Elizabeth Nicole Forrester. Maya is thrilled for the reunited Nicole and Zende. She finds Sasha's sudden pregnancy highly suspect and tells Nicole that there are means to get clarity... Sasha restates her proposition to Julius to join forces to get back in the good graces of those they love. Following a rather lackluster photo shoot, Sasha is confronted by Maya and Nicole who are presenting her a pregnancy test. Not having spoken about Douglas' paternity in a while, Ridge firmly reiterates to Thomas his role in his son's life. Thomas is shocked when Ridge reveals he wants Thomas to go to Shanghai for the company.

videos.title: Ep. #7365
videos.overview: Brooke and Ridge share fond memories of their past together; Katie seeks answers from Liam by expressing to him her concern and insecurities regarding Bill.

videos.title: Ep. #7366
videos.overview: Liam and Katie make a pact to look out for each other's romantic interests in the future; Brooke finds herself in the difficult position of having to walk her talk when it comes to Bill.

videos.title: Ep. #7384
videos.overview: Thanks to her seatmates, Quinn has a less than glamours flight to Monte Carlo to proclaim her love to Eric. As the Forrester's and the Spencer's meet for a successful summit, Steffy and Wyatt and Liam are put in charge of talking with the press. Eric surprises the media that he is returning to his company as CEO. Liam attempts to have a moment alone with Steffy.

videos.title: Ep. #7385
videos.overview: As Quinn leaves for the resort where Eric is staying, he is reminiscing about his time with her until Liam arrives in his room to share his resentment towards Quinn. After talking with Eric on the phone, Quinn intends on surprising him at the beach. Wyatt and Steffy are enjoying some romantic time together as a brooding Liam looks on, remember his time with Steffy. Liam is less than thrilled at discovering Quinn arrived in Monte Carlo.

videos.title: Ep. #7417
videos.overview: Rick surprises Maya by pulling some strings to get her to sing the National Anthem at a Dodgers game. Ridge asks Brooke if it's wise to marry Bill in order to gain control of Forrester from him. Steffy is stunned with Eric tells her that he proposed to Quinn.

videos.title: Ep. #7427
videos.overview: Eric is devastated when the only family member to show up to his wedding to Quinn is Ivy. Following the ceremony, Ivy goes down to Forrester Creations to give Ridge and the others a piece of her mind.

videos.title: Ep. #7461
videos.overview: Eric invites Katie to the mansion to watch the fashion show, while Ridge is less than thrilled with Quinn in charge and is certain the show will fail. As the Forrester clan is happy with how the show it going, personal drama between Maya and Sasha take place backstage, and Ridge tells a surprised Quinn that he's not putting his showstopper in the show following her "jewelry parade". Quinn then stuns everyone by ending the show in Ridge's gown, leaving him furious.

videos.title: Ep. #7494
videos.overview: Tensions rise between Steffy & Liam as she contemplates Eric & Quinn's generous offer; Ridge artfully evades Brooke's many questions regarding Quinn

videos.title: Ep. #7495
videos.overview: Quinn struggles with remaining emotionally loyal to Eric as her feelings for Ridge intensify; Liam assures Wyatt that he will not let go of Steffy without a fight.

videos.title: Ep. #7496
videos.overview: Ivy confronts Quinn about what she witnessed in the steam room; Eric makes it clear to Steffy that he prefers her to be with Wyatt instead of Liam.

videos.title: Ep. #7497
videos.overview: Ridge pays Eric a visit in an attempt to get him to change his mind about the CEO position; Quinn confides in Ivy the current struggles she's been faced with in her marriage and in the office.

videos.title: Ep. #7498
videos.overview: Liam pressures Ridge to follow through with his plan to rid their lives of Quinn; Eric, Quinn, & Wyatt make an enticing presentation to Steffy about what her future could hold.

videos.overview: Eric tempts Steffy into buying his offer by putting a dollar amount on her future; Brooke gives Ridge a perfect opportunity to get Quinn out of their lives for good.

videos.overview: Wyatt and Quinn accept their defeat over a few rounds of tequila shots; Steffy ponders how to deal with Wyatt while they await their divorce.

videos.overview: Quinn is dumbfounded by Ridge's sudden change in attitude toward her; Wyatt attempts to get Liam to admit that Quinn has some positive attributes.

videos.overview: Quinn calls Ridge out on his manipulative scheme to make her look bad to Eric; Katie is not shy with her words about Eric's plan to reunite Steffy & Wyatt.

videos.overview: Thomas shares heartbreaking news about his personal life; Ridge witnesses a softer side of Quinn and has a better understanding of what makes her tick.

videos.overview: Wyatt invites Steffy over to his house to discuss their marriage and future; Quinn develops a greater appreciation for Eric after her trip to San Francisco with Ridge.

videos.overview: Ivy expresses concern about Quinn, prompting Katie to become suspicious; not having heard from Steffy as promised, Liam decides to keep his word on the ultimatum he issued.

videos.overview: Ridge's family interrogates him about his suddenly softer attitude toward Quinn; Quinn gives Eric an idea of a way to bring his family together again.

videos.overview: Ridge & Katie exchange antagonistic warnings regarding their future interactions with Quinn; Steffy & Liam reminisce about their past weddings while preparing for their next one.

videos.overview: Thomas becomes outraged when he learns of the additional changes occurring at Forrester Creations; Liam becomes even more suspicious of Quinn's motives when Steffy tells him of Ridge's new position.

videos.overview: Brooke returns from Italy expecting an update on Ridge's plan to rid Quinn from their lives; Steffy confronts Quinn about her sudden change in attitude toward Ridge.

videos.overview: A discouraged Thomas considers leaving Forrester Creations; Brooke questions Ridge about what went on between him and Quinn while she was in Europe

videos.title: Ep. #7518
videos.overview: Ridge attempts to put Bill in his place regarding his place in Brooke's life; Ridge makes a confession to Brooke about the secret he and Quinn have been keeping.

videos.title: Ep. #7519
videos.overview: Thomas is unable to hide his frustration as he voices to Steffy his disapproval of her promotion; Brooke confides in Bill the true reason why she felt the need to leave town for so long.

videos.title: Ep. #7520
videos.overview: Wyatt submits his resignation at Forrester Creations in order to move on to a life without Steffy; Steffy makes an attempt to resolve her issues with Thomas over lunch at Il Giardino.

videos.title: Ep. #7521
videos.overview: Quinn's vulnerable side comes out to Eric when she reveals her insecurity about their marriage; Brooke confronts Katie about her developing feelings for a married man.

videos.title: Ep. #7522
videos.overview: Zende plans a surprise for Nicole using a Forrester Creations' photo shoot as a ruse; Steffy makes a decision about how to handle her recent portrayal on social media.

videos.title: Ep. #7523
videos.overview: A newly engaged couple are eager to walk down the aisle; Sasha returns to town with hopes of redeeming herself with Nicole & the Avant family.

videos.title: Ep. #7524
videos.overview: Family & friends gather at Forrester Creations to celebrate the nuptials of a reunited couple; Quinn fights with territorial feelings in her home & the draw that she feels toward Ridge.

videos.title: Ep. #7525
videos.overview: During the wedding ceremony, guests collectively bond over the love radiating from the happy couple; Bill & Wyatt commiserate over the loves they have lost.

videos.title: Ep. #7526
videos.overview: Ridge & Quinn have a hard time hiding their connection to each other; Steffy finds herself in an unfavorable familiar circumstance.

videos.title: Ep. #7527
videos.overview: Ridge & Quinn address the sexual tension between them & how to deal with it in the future; Bill pays a visit to Brooke with the intent of putting doubts in her mind about marrying Ridge.

videos.title: Ep. #7528
videos.overview: Ivy confronts Quinn about what she witnessed following Nicole & Zende's wedding reception. Ridge reveals an innermost thought about himself to Brooke, after asking her if she wants to marry him.

videos.title: Ep. #7529
videos.overview: Ivy feels compelled to disclose an important piece of info to Brooke before she walks down the aisle with Ridge. Bill uses his position of power to make sure that Spectra Fashions' first preview is a failure.

videos.title: Ep. #7530
videos.overview: An already-bitter Thomas gets his feathers ruffled when Steffy criticizes his latest designs. Spectra Fashions debut their first collection in an intimate and informal setting.

videos.title: Ep. #7531
videos.overview: The Spectra crew await the review of their new collection, which will determine their success. Bill meets with a shady business associate to ensure that he acquires his intended real-estate investment.

videos.title: Ep. #7532
videos.overview: Ridge & Quinn come to an agreement regarding the dangerous flirtation that's been going on between them; Shirley advises Sally to take a page out of the original Spectra Fashion playbook regarding their future designs.

videos.title: Ep. #7533
videos.overview: Steffy and Liam make a big announcement about their destination wedding; Sally and Shirley take drastic measures to infiltrate Forrester Creations.

videos.title: Ep. #7534
videos.overview: Ridge and Quinn find themselves in a predicament where temptation becomes unbearable; RJ takes a special interest in Forrester Creations' most recent intern applicant.

videos.title: Ep. #7535
videos.overview: Spectra Fashions fall upon hard times, forcing the entire company to make sacrifices, especially Sally; Thomas and RJ are met with significant resistance from the rest of the Forrester Creations' crew regarding the new intern's employment.

videos.title: Ep. #7536
videos.overview: Brooke presents Bill with a birthday gift almost as precious to him as she is; Charlie tells Pam about suspicions he has regarding Ridge's and Quinn's loyalties to their significant others.

videos.title: Ep. #7537
videos.overview: Bill takes Brooke to a special location to prove to her just how much he loves her; Ridge and Quinn express their feelings toward each other and discuss the next step in their relationship.

videos.title: Ep. #7538
videos.overview: Sally plots to get Spectra back in business, and she uses her sister in her scheme to infiltrate the competition; Ridge and Brooke share the news of their imminent wedding plans with RJ, not realizing a stranger is listening to them.

videos.title: Ep. #7539
videos.overview: Coco commits a selfless act of heroism in a life-threatening situation, and she's rewarded with a warm welcome at Forrester Creations; Saul works to install spy equipment in Coco's jewelry, and Sally gives him a rare glimpse into her past.

videos.title: Ep. #7540
videos.overview: Ridge meets with his team at Forrester and informs them of the impending nuptials and fashion shows taking place in Australia; Sally feels guilty when she gives an unsuspecting Coco special jewelry containing a hidden camera.

videos.title: Ep. #7543
videos.overview: Katie is surprised & hurt at Brooke's reaction to her suspicions concerning Quinn & Ridge; Eric, Ridge, & Brooke relish in the fact that things are on the upswing for the Forrester family.

videos.title: Ep. #7544
videos.overview: Steffy & Liam head to Australia to be married, & they're thrilled their families are with them; much to Saul's chagrin, Sally decides to take Thomas up on his offer & books a cheap plane ticket to Australia.

videos.title: Ep. #7545
videos.overview: Sally winds up in a position that Quinn's familiar with; Katie spies on Ridge & Quinn mid-flight and witnesses something that convinces her they are up to no good.

videos.title: Ep. #7546
videos.overview: Brooke finds herself not knowing whom to believe: Katie or Ridge; Eric & Quinn enjoy a day of exploring the Sydney Harbor; Sally anticipates surprising Thomas with her arrival

videos.title: Ep. #7547
videos.overview: Steffy & Ivy are the focus of a Forrester Creations' photo shoot in front of the Sydney Opera House; Sally is torn between her mission of stealing Forrester designs and her growing feelings for Thomas.

videos.title: Ep. #7548
videos.overview: Steffy & Liam become joined in matrimony with iconic landmarks of Sydney as the backdrop; Wyatt sulks over a few drinks knowing that his ex-wife and brother are tying the knot.

videos.title: Ep. #7554
videos.overview: Thomas comes to Sally's defense when members of his family criticize her character; distrustful of the Spectra family, Zende keeps a close watch on Coco as she & RJ handle Forrester Creations' newest designs.

videos.title: Ep. #7555
videos.overview: Katie confronts Ridge about the current state of his & Brooke's relationship; Coco & RJ get to know each other better by revealing moments from their respective pasts.

videos.title: Ep. #7556
videos.overview: Katie pressures Brooke to tell Eric about Ridge & Quinn's affair; when word spreads about Brooke & Ridge's wedding being called off, the family scramble to get answers.

videos.title: Ep. #7557
videos.overview: Pam & Charlie hold their secret when questions surface surrounding Brooke & Ridge's failed attempt to be married; Katie confronts Quinn about her affair & Eric's right to know about it.

videos.title: Ep. #7558
videos.overview: Ridge confesses his mistake to Brooke and pleads with her to forgive her; Katie enjoys torturing Quinn by holding the information that can destroy her marriage to Eric.

videos.title: Ep. #7559
videos.overview: Shirley finds a new and innovative way to get Coco to unknowingly wear a camera at Forrester Creations; Thomas becomes defensive when Steffy chides him about taking Sally to her wedding.

videos.title: Ep. #7560
videos.overview: When Sally shows signs of wavering on their plan, Shirley knows which buttons to push to get her granddaughter back on board; Darlita gets the surprise of her life while watching the feed from Coco's spy camera.

videos.title: Ep. #7561
videos.overview: Thomas is blindsided and heartbroken by Sally when she makes an abrupt change in their plans; the Spectra clan hit the jackpot when their plan of espionage finally pays off.

videos.title: Ep. #7562
videos.overview: Bill is adamant with his reporter, insisting that the review of the Spectra fashion show be scathing; separately, Thomas & Sally turn to their loved ones for comfort about their loss of the other.

videos.title: Ep. #7563
videos.overview: Steffy uses an opportune moment to remind Sally all that she gave up when she broke up with Thomas; having had to prove her loyalty to Forrester Creations, Coco gets assurance from RJ that he has her back.

videos.title: Ep. #7564
videos.overview: Anticipating the failure of the upcoming Spectra fashion show, Bill makes CJ an offer on the family building; Sally & Shirley juggle planning the debut of their new line and keeping Coco away from the stolen designs.

videos.title: Ep. #7565
videos.overview: The gang at Spectra Fashions prep for their fashion show, which could make or break their future; Bill shares with Wyatt his plan for the old Spectra building.

videos.title: Ep. #7566
videos.overview: Thomas is overtaken by a wave of heartbreak and betrayal at the finale of the Spectra fashion show; Coco learns that she was a pawn in her family's plan to garner success for their company.

videos.title: Ep. #7567
videos.overview: The Forresters call an emergency meeting to deal with the ramifications of the Spectra fashion show; in spite of the tremendous success of the new collection, Sally has deep regret subsequent to her run-in with Thomas.

videos.title: Ep. #7568
videos.overview: Coco angrily confronts Sally for using her to steal the Forresters' designs without her knowledge; Steffy forbids Thomas and RJ from having contact with the Spectras.

videos.title: Ep. #7569
videos.overview: Brooke returns to Bill something that's important to him; Katie makes an unannounced visit to Quinn with expectations to collect on a promise previously made.

videos.title: Ep. #7570
videos.overview: Brooke surprises Bill with some of his favorite things to show her appreciation for his persistence and loyalty; Ridge quickly catches on to Katie's scheme to get back at Quinn for her previous misdeeds.

videos.title: Ep. #7571
videos.overview: Ridge attempts to heal his heartbreak by replacing the designs stolen by Spectra Fashions; Katie has a much different opinion than Quinn regarding a suitable position for her at Forrester Creations.

videos.title: Ep. #7572
videos.overview: Coco weighs her future career options following her banishment from Forrester Creations; Ridge & Steffy decide to exact revenge on Spectra Fashions by getting Lt. Baker involved.

videos.title: Ep. #7573
videos.overview: Sally is caught off guard by Coco's response to her offer; RJ is put on the spot when his family recruits him to complete an uncomfortable task.

videos.title: Ep. #7574
videos.overview: Bill is grateful for his reunion with Brooke, but he wants to know why she ended her engagement to Ridge; Coco is torn between her family and her first love after being asked to turn on one of them.

videos.title: Ep. #7575
videos.overview: Thomas begins to have second thoughts about supporting his family's intent to prosecute Sally; Sally learns the hard way the consequences of orchestrating the Forrester Creations' designs heist.

videos.title: Ep. #7576

videos.overview: Katie's presence at work causes Quinn unbearable anxiety; Ridge feels pangs of guilt as Eric advises him on how to win back Brooke's heart.

videos.overview: Zende surprises Nicole with a confession he's never shared with anyone else; Sally informs her employees that Spectra Fashions is shutting its doors for good.
